snippet: Considering agriculture useless in enriching Indians, Prime Minister Narendra Modi wants to bring millions of poor young farmers to low-skill manufacturing jobs.
lead_paragraph: Considering agriculture useless in enriching Indians, Prime Minister Narendra Modi wants to bring millions of poor young farmers to low-skill manufacturing jobs.

headline.main: Modi Sees Shiny Cities in India’s Future
headline.print_headline: Modi Sees Shiny Cities in Future
